title: PBE signups
body: I apparently cannot sign up? Or it broke? I'm honor level 5, have never been punished, and been a religious league player since S3. I just want to get on the PBE, dangit.

replies.body: It's currently being hugged to death, per our [announcement thread](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/JtsFmpNI-pbe-sign-ups-are-open).  We don't have visibility on PBE, if you have any feedback you'll want to shoot it over in that thread.  Hang tight!

Hi Porocles. I've been getting the same error message as the OP of this thread. Do you know how long the PBE sign-ups will be available for? Also, do you know if will the sign-ups close after a certain date/time or will they close after a certain threshold is met?
I haven't heard of any limits, but we're not part of the PBE team.  I don't imagine sign ups going down unless there is a major issue that requires taking it offline temporarily.
